## Calculating predicted value for the car on previous slide

```{r, results='asis', echo=TRUE}
techs <- function(car) mtcars[car,]
car <- "Mazda RX4"
round(9.618-3.917*techs(car)$wt+1.226*techs(car)$qsec
      +2.936*techs(car)$am,digits=2)
```
